'''Andy 'Needsmoreclever' Hill''' was a member of the ''[[Minecraft]]'' and ''[[RenderDragon]]'' development teams at [[Mojang Studios]]. They also hosted the official Minecraft livestreams ''Join the Club'' and ''Casual Friday''. They appeared at multiple Minefaire events throughout the US representing [[Mojang Studios]].
